title: 0.3.0 - More sane tweaks!
changes: backward kill without copy to clipboard
Cleaned up the file backups behaviorc

title: 0.2.5 - Fixed terrible Emacs bug, added changelog, added RSS
changes: Emacs has been plagued with a pretty horrible bug recently, rendering it broken by default. The "Failed to download 'GNU' archive" error. ([As described here](https://www.reddit.com/r/emacs/comments/cueoug/the_failed_to_download_gnu_archive_is_a_pretty/)). Now, Sanemacs users do not have to worry about this. ðŸ˜ƒ
Added a changelog to the website
Added an RSS feed for the changelog. Subscribe to this to keep track of the latest updates! [Link to RSS feed](https://sanemacs.com/updates.xml)
